## ServiceTimeoutError class

ServiceTimeoutError indicates Fauna was not available to servce the request before the timeout was reached.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ServiceTimeoutError extends ServiceError
```

<b>Extends:</b> [ServiceError](./fauna.serviceerror.md)
